import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody, CardText, CustomInput } from 'reactstrap' const SwitchColors = () => { return ( Colors Use class .custom-control-colorName to change switch's color
Primary
Secondary
Success
Danger
Warning
Info
Dark
) } export default SwitchColors
